job_title: Salesforce Business Analyst with Marketing Cloud
jd: From: Danish Mujeeb, Han Staffing danish@hanstaffing.com Reply to: danish@hanstaffing.com Job Title: Salesforce Business Analyst with Marketing CloudLocation: NJ (Hybrid role)Duration: Long Term ContractJob Description:Key qualification:5+ years of Strong Salesforce experience with 2+ years of experience in Salesforce Marketing CloudDemonstrate solid knowledge of Salesforce Marketing Cloud standard methodologies and functionality including Email studio, Mobile Studio, Automation studio, Journey Builder, Interaction Studio, Ad Studio and Audience BuilderExperience of leading client workshops to facilitate best practice solutions and designs for marketing automation.Experience with Automations, Journey set up and development, SMS campaigns, mobile app notifications, data model development.Certified Salesforce marketing cloud system AdministratorDemonstrable expertise in Salesforce CRM reporting & analyticsRoles and Responsibilities:Lead Discovery session: Lead Discovery Workshop Sessions with Business teams to capture document requirements.Design and document solutions: Design and document end-to-end solutions for key business requirements Communicate with non-technical stakeholders: Communicate complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders and executives.Document User Stories and Acceptance Criteria: Train and support end-users: Provide training and support to end-users as needed.
